outputs.output_descr: Through the framework provided by a UNDP Project, six agencies including IOM, OHCHR, UNAIDS, UNFPA UNHCR, UNICEF and UNDP plan tocome together under the new Country Programme to collectively support the HRC, in a harmonized manner with interventions aligned to the priorities identified by the HRC as per the new HRC Strategic Plan (2013-2016).

outputs.output_title: SUPPORT TO THE HRC PHASE II

project_descr: The prevention, protection and monitoring capacities of the Human Rights Commission Sri Lanka strengthened to enable it to make recommendations to government policy and legislation, in conformity with international HR commitments, standards ,practices.
project_title: SUPPORT TO HUMAN RIGHTS COMMISSION IN SRI LANKA
